name: PENNSYLVANIA LIQUOR CONTROL BOARD, Appellant, v. Governor Robert P. CASEY, Appellee; Edward A. CLOONAN, Appellant, v. The Honorable Robert P. CASEY, Governor of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania Liquor Control Board v. Casey
docket_number: Appeal No. 13 M.D. Appeal Dkt. 1987; Appeal No. 7 M.D. Appeal Dkt. 1987

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: PENNSYLVANIA LIQUOR CONTROL BOARD, Appellant, v. Governor Robert P. CASEY, Appellee. Edward A. CLOONAN, Appellant, v. The Honorable Robert P. CASEY, Governor of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeals dismissed as moot. See Act No. 1987-14.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert W. Barton, John D. Killian, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Richard D. Spiegelman, Barry M. Hartman, Andrew Cline, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Stuart M. Niemtzow, Philadelphia, Jerome H. Gerber, Harrisburg, Gary P. Hunt, Richard B. Tucker, III, Jeffrey J. Downing, Pittsburgh, for intervenors.
casebody.head_matter:
531 A.2d 1391
PENNSYLVANIA LIQUOR CONTROL BOARD, Appellant, v. Governor Robert P. CASEY, Appellee. Edward A. CLOONAN, Appellant, v. The Honorable Robert P. CASEY, Governor of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 7, 1987.
Decided Oct. 15, 1987.
Robert W. Barton, John D. Killian, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Richard D. Spiegelman, Barry M. Hartman, Andrew Cline, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Stuart M. Niemtzow, Philadelphia, Jerome H. Gerber, Harrisburg, Gary P. Hunt, Richard B. Tucker, III, Jeffrey J. Downing, Pittsburgh, for intervenors.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
